name: Python 3.11 · Poetry · Azure CLI · Azure Functions Core Tools (apt-first)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH:/home/vscode/.local/bin; poetry --version || true; poetry config virtualenvs.in-project true --local || true; if [ -f pyproject.toml ]; then poetry install --no-interaction || echo 'poetry install failed'; else echo 'no pyproject.toml found'; fi; echo 'done postCreate'"
